term.title: nuclear reactor

item.text: A device in which a self-sustaining nuclear fissionchain reaction can be maintained and controlled. The term is sometimes applied to a device in which a nuclear fusion reaction can be produced and controlled.

sources.item: PAC, 1982, 54, 1533. 'Glossary of terms used in nuclear analytical chemistry (Provisional)' on page 1550 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198254081533)
